item.description:
This is the first combined gathering of the "Single Event's" (Singles mostly in their 40's - 50's) "Thirsty Thursday" group (rather then meet in a bar, this is our first BYOB function) and "FREE Live Outdoor Music", "Unmarried", and "Social Hourz" MeetUps. Some don't bother with RSVP, so accurate number of attendees unclear. Find Steve T. with a "Thirsty Thursday" sign!

***

Twain at Twilight Free Summer Concert Series

"Jazz Alive Quartet" = From Cole Porter to John Coltrane and Miles to Monk the Jazz Alive Quartet specializes in the performance of the great American standards, blues and beyond.

Bring lawn chairs or a blanket; pack a picnic dinner (be discreet re: BYOB) or purchase dinner in the Mark Twain Caf√©, now featuring Tallulah's catering. The Mark Twain Store will be open all evening.

Location: LOWER LAWN of the Mark Twain House & Museum (enter via Farmington Ave. parking lot).

>>> IF RAIN: event will be held inside. <<<

Cost: FREE

Twain at Twilight is sponsored by The Evelyn W. Preston Memorial Fund.

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends

item.name: Jazz Alive Quartet - BYOB & picnic
